current.title: Dynamic Projected Cash Flow Chart
current.summary: This project implements a complex class to analyze and project cash flow using historical data stored in a SQLite database

current.title: Analysis and Optimization of an Investment Portfolio Using Machine Learning Models
current.summary: The main objective is to build a model capable of analyzing historical data of financial assets and optimizing an investment portfolio using advanced machine learning techniques

current.title: Optimization of Investment Portfolio Using Advanced Machine Learning Models and Dimensionality Reduction
current.summary: The model highlights the use of advanced Machine Learning techniques, such as Random Forest and XGBoost, along with dimensionality reduction using PCA
